SELECT A.TABLE_NAME TAB_NAME , (SELECT C.COMMENTS FROM DBA_TAB_COMMENTS C WHERE A.OWNER = c.owner AND A.TABLE_NAME = c.table_name) AS TAB_COMMENT , b.column_id AS COL_ID , b.column_name AS COL_NAME , (SELECT D.COMMENTS FROM dba_col_comments D WHERE A.OWNER = D.OWNER AND A.TABLE_NAME = D.TABLE_NAME AND B.COLUMN_NAME = D.COLUMN_NAME) COL_COMMENT , B.DATA_TYPE , CASE WHEN B.DATA_TYPE IN ('VARCHAR', 'VARCHAR2', 'CHAR') THEN TO_CHAR(B.DATA_LENGTH) WHEN B.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' THEN B.DATA_PRECISION || ',' || DECODE(B.DATA_SCALE, 0, '0', B.DATA_SCALE) ELSE '' END DATA_LEN , B.NULLABLE FROM DBA_TABLES A JOIN dba_tab_columns B ON A.OWNER = b.owner AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME WHERE A.OWNER = 'HYBRIS' ORDER BY A.TABLE_NAME, b.column_name
SELECT TABLE_NAME TAB_NAME , '' TAB_COMMENT , ORDINAL_POSITION COL_ID , COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME , '' COL_COMMENT , DATA_TYPE DATA_TYPE , COLUMN_TYPE COL_TYPE , IS_NULLABLE NULLABLE , COLUMN_KEY COL_KEY FROM information_schema.COLUMNS COL WHERE col.table_schema = 'handsome' ORDER BY COL.TABLE_NAME, COL.COLUMN_NAME
